document_data.name: To'Zon
document_data.mainbody: '''To'Zon''' was a [[korobokuru]] [[wu jen]] inhabiting the [[Rainbow Monastery]] in [[Ra-Khati]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: To'Zon stood 4 feet (1.2 meters) tall and had long shaggy hair.
document_data.Personality: A strong temper and unpredictable nature often spelled trouble for To'Zun.
document_data.Activities:
The [[Grand Army of the Tuigan|Tuigan army]] forced To'Zon into service when they passed through the region. However, he helped organize a desertion for some of the soldiers, eventually leading them to the Rainbow Monastery.

His wu jen taboo was to never cut his hair or bathe.
document_data.Abilities:
To'Zon could cast the following spells: ''[[magic missile]]'', ''[[invisibility]]'', ''[[detect invisible]]'', ''[[fire shuriken]]'', ''[[haste]]'', ''[[protection from normal missiles]]'', and ''[[wall of fire]]''.

He could also focus his ''[[ki]]'', allowing him to execute sudden bursts of speed that usually caught his opponents off-guard. His ''ki'' could also be used to magnify the effects of his spells.
document_data.Possessions: To'Zon wore a pair of ''[[bracers of defense]]''.
